newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Sao Paulo bankruptcies drop 6.2 pct in Sept.
newsitem.headline: Sao Paulo bankruptcies drop 6.2 pct in Sept.

text.p: Bankruptcy filings in the city of Sao Paulo totalled 1,038 in September, a drop of 6.2 percent from the same month last year, Sao Paulo's Commerce Association (ACSP) said in a statement.
September bankruptcy filings also fell 24.9 percent when compared with August, ACSP said.
In addition to the bankruptcy filings, 14 Sao Paulo firms filed for debt relief in September 1996 against 34 in the same month last year, the association said.
September debt relief filings also dropped when compared to August, when 24 firms filed for debt relief, it said.
